title: Holy, Holy, Holy Lord
verses:
Holy, holy, holy Lord,
God of hosts, thy name we praise;
Heavenly hosts proclaim thy word,
Filled with wonder and amaze.

Cherubim and seraphim
Bow before thy sacred throne;
With their voices sweet and dim,
Make thy glorious presence known.

We, thy people, gathered here,
Join the everlasting song;
Let our voices, loud and clear,
Swell the praise of heaven's throng.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Reverent worship hymn emphasizing God's holiness and heavenly worship
